Testimonials Section.Layout: Grid layout with one to three columns depending on the screen size, each containing a testimonial.
Testimonials Section.Design: Clean and simple, focused on user testimonials with text, user image, and user details.

Key Elements.Section Title: Centered and bold, introducing the testimonials.
Key Elements.Testimonial Block: Each block includes a quote, user image, and user details.
Key Elements.User Details: Includes name, role, and company, aligned for visual clarity.
Key Elements.Responsive Design: Adapts from a single column on small screens to multiple columns on larger screens.

Testimonials Section.Use Cases: Ideal for showcasing customer testimonials, reviews, or client feedback on company websites, particularly in service-oriented industries or for products with high user satisfaction.
